name: UNIVERSE_E2E_STRICT_V1
title: E2E local estrito: gerar sample -> selecionar CANDIDATES valido (schema) -> gerar SUPERVISED (sem fallback)
objective: Eliminar fallback silencioso: supervised só roda com candidates identificado e validado por schema. Se candidates falhar/estiver inválido, a task falha.

commands: cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && echo 'DIRS:' && ls -la data/raw/market/prices data/universe || true

cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && test -f data/universe/UNIVERSE_CANDIDATES.schema.md && echo 'OK: data/universe/UNIVERSE_CANDIDATES.schema.md' || (echo 'ERROR: schema.md não encontrado em data/universe/' && exit 2)

cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && SAMPLE=data/raw/market/prices/sample_market_data.parquet && if [ -f "$SAMPLE" ]; then echo "OK: sample já existe -> $SAMPLE"; else echo "GERANDO: $SAMPLE"; python scripts/generate_sample_market_data.py; fi

cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && python - <<'PY'
from pathlib import Path
p = Path('data/raw/market/prices/sample_market_data.parquet')
print('EXISTS:', p.exists())
print('PATH:', p.resolve())
if p.exists():
  print('SIZE_BYTES:', p.stat().st_size)
else:
  raise SystemExit(2)
PY

cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && python scripts/build_universe_candidates.py --output-summary-path data/universe/run_summary_TASK_A_012.json -v; rc=$?; echo "UNIVERSE_CANDIDATES_EXIT_CODE=$rc"; if [ $rc -eq 0 ] || [ $rc -eq 1 ]; then exit 0; else exit $rc; fi

cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && CAND=$(cat planning/runs/TASK_A_012/candidates_path.txt) && test -n "$CAND" && echo "USING CANDIDATES: $CAND" && python scripts/build_universe_supervised.py --candidates "$CAND" --output-dir data/universe/supervised_TASK_A_012 --list -v

cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && echo 'RUN SUMMARY JSON (top 260):' && (test -f data/universe/run_summary_TASK_A_012.json && sed -n '1,260p' data/universe/run_summary_TASK_A_012.json || echo 'WARN: run_summary_TASK_A_012.json não encontrado')
cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && echo 'DATA UNIVERSE TREE (top 200):' && (find data/universe -maxdepth 4 -type f | sort | sed -n '1,200p')
cd /home/wilson/PortfolioZero && echo 'MARKET DATA TREE (top 200):' && (find data/raw/market -maxdepth 4 -type f | sort | sed -n '1,200p')
